import{seedRandom}from'./seedRandom';import{WORDLES,NUM_WORDLES}from'./words';export function generateWordlist(){var length=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1000;var seed=seedRandom();var generator=163;// n is a cyclic group so I can put any prime as a generator (maybe?)
var wordlist=[];for(var i=0;i<length;i++){wordlist.push(WORDLES[(seed+generator*i)%NUM_WORDLES]);}return wordlist;}
